item.title: R and Python
item.description: Over the course of the semester, we have explored various different aspects of R including wrangling in project 1 and modeling in project 2 . Recently, we began to talk about python and its interactions with R. Python is a general software development programming language that has evolved over time to included packages that allow it to do things that many other languages focus on like data science with R and website design with HTML.
